words.ex: Her keen insight helped resolve the issue quickly.
His keenness to learn impressed the entire team.
He kept kibitzing from the sidelines despite not playing.
Budget cuts put the kibosh on the expansion plans.
The lecture kindled her interest in astrophysics.
The sculpture had a kinetic quality that suggested motion.
She felt an unexpected kinship with the new colleagues.
They met by pure kismet on a rainy afternoon.
She has a knack for simplifying complex ideas.
The story’s villain was a charming but dangerous knave.
He kneaded the dough until it became smooth and elastic.
The announcement sounded the knell for the old policy.
A small cottage stood atop the grassy knoll.
She received well‑deserved kudos for her contribution.
